shortContent:
Completely immune to
the effects of poisons, diseases, the need to breathe, most
environmental hazards, bleeding, stunning, and any critical
result other than one that would destroy them outright, unless
caused by a psychic power, force weapon, or holy attack.
content:
Some warp entities are so terribly powerful the will
perpetuating their bodies in our reality is almost impossible
to break or disrupt. Such entities are completely immune to
the effects of poisons, diseases, the need to breathe, most
environmental hazards, bleeding, stunning, and any critical
result other than one that would destroy them outright, unless
caused by a psychic power, force weapon, or holy attack.
